awscc_ses_mail_manager_archive (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::SES::MailManagerArchive

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • archive_arn (String)
  • archive_id (String)
  • archive_name (String)
  • archive_state (String)
  • kms_key_arn (String)
  • retention (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • tags (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for retention

Read-Only:

  • retention_period (String)

Nested Schema for tags

Read-Only:

  • key (String)
  • value (String)
